thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Benjamin

author: Benjamin
title: Benjamin
text:
Not just saying this, but I have used a ton of online flight search engines. But Flight Hub stands out in navigation,email alerts of cheap flights and pretty much everything else. Also has a map to show you hotel locations with costs and discounts. My grandfather who is 90 and hasn't touch a computer in his life could book me a flight.
Once again, I am not just a person sitting behind a keyboard working for the company writing their own reviews. This website does help. Just check it out for yourself and see!
